title: FS:  T206 Shag Shaughnessy Old Mill SGC 40(VG3)
author: SetBuilder

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Shag Shaughnessy Old Mill SGC 40(VG3)
posts.post_content:
For sale I have an always popular Shag Shaughnessy in an Old Mill back.  The card is graded 40 by SGC which equals a VG grade.  No paper loss or creasing.  See image.  

I accept PayPal, buyer pays the fee.  

SOLD! shipped
